column4: is totem unable to play streaming audio?  (even after adding the various codecs and non-free format stuff)
Plays it for me. I just use "Open Location"
It won't open it by clicking on the URL, but if you copy the URL and paste it in the "Open Location" dialogue in the gui, it works for me
I'm attempting to listen to a local radio station via the web.  I'm not sure I know what the address I need to connect to is.
